import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
%matplotlib inline
source.ba174666:
def show_values(col):
    index = df[col].value_counts().index
    values = df[col].value_counts().values
    
    plt.figure(figsize=(10,4))
    plt.title(col)
    sns.barplot(x=index, y=values)
    plt.show()
source.594327c4:
def show_dist(col):
    plt.figure(figsize=(10,4))
    plt.title(col)
    sns.distplot(df[col])
    plt.show()
